author: Warhammer
description:
Necron armour adorns Lychguard shields and any Canoptek creation. It looks awesome and is super fun to paint. Tune in to this paint guide to see how it’s done!

Here’s a list of the paints and tools we used in today’s video:

Base:
Abaddon Black

Layer:
Moot Green
Warpstone Glow
Yriel Yellow

Tools:
L Base
S Layer

If you enjoyed this and want to learn more, our YouTube channel has an array of beginner-friendly videos to get you started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@warhammerofficial
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/

- Get Warhammer in your inbox: https://ow.ly/6SJq50T3NL1
title: How To Paint Necron Armour | Warhammer 40,000
